feed.title: Far-Fetched Advisory and Consulting
feed.subtitle: Strategic technology leader with over 20 years’ experience in software engineering, platform architecture, and organizational design. Far-Fetched Advisory and Consulting partners with digital businesses, especially in iGaming and other regulated or high-growth sectors—to scale platforms, optimize delivery, and raise engineering standards. We specialize in high-performance systems, team structuring, and product–tech alignment for ambitious companies seeking sustainable growth.
